parameters.name: diagnosticsId
parameters.description: OPTIONAL [diagnosticsId to filter data by diagnostics]

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: OPTIONAL [required only to get other user's reports]

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type is required [1 - Appointment, 2 - Wallet, 3 - Course, 4 - Instant Consultation]

parameters.name: consultType
parameters.description: [OPTIONAL] [1 - Audio Call, 2 - Video Call, 3 - Chat]  [required only for type=1(ONLINE Appointment) and type=4]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: [OPTIONAL]  [if type=1, then appointmentId, if 3 then courseId, if 4 then professionalId]

parameters.name: paymentMode
parameters.description: paymentMode is required [eg Credit Card,Debit Card, Paypal, Wallet, etc ]

parameters.name: recurringType
parameters.description: recurringType - OPTIONAL ['INITIAL' in case of making initial recurring payment]

parameters.name: createRegistration
parameters.description: createRegistration - OPTIONAL ['true' for recurring payment as well as for saving a card, it'll return a registrationId which is required for saving card and recurring payment]

parameters.name: consultType
parameters.description: registrationId is required [1 - Audio Call, 2 - Video Call, 3 - Chat]

parameters.name: recurringType
parameters.description: recurringType - OPTIONAL ['INITIAL' in case of making initial recurring payment]

parameters.name: createRegistration
parameters.description: createRegistration - OPTIONAL ['true' for recurring payment as well as for saving a card, it'll return a registrationId which is required for saving card and recurring payment]

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: action is required [0 - subtract amount, 1 - add amount]

parameters.description: [OPTIONAL] [1 - Audio Call, 2 - Video Call, 3 - Chat]  [required only for type=1(ONLINE Appointment) and type=4]

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: [OPTIONAL] [if type=1, then appointmentId, if 3 then courseId, if 4 then professionalId]

parameters.description: [OPTIONAL] [if type=1, then appointmentId, if 4 then professionalId]

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: [OPTIONAL] required if paymentMode is credit card, to capture previously holded payment

parameters.name: isRecurring
parameters.description: isRecurring is required [0 - initial payment capture,  1 - recurring payment capture]

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: wallet payment action is OPTIONAL [this parameter will be used in webview only by Sandeep only in case of paymentMode='wallet'. 0 - subtract, 1 - add]

parameters.description: amount is required [ 0 - All, 1 - Appointment, 2 - Wallet, 3 - Course, 4 - Instant Consultation]
